description: Ten-Thousand Vajra Ball Bodhisattva is http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou Isao]`s ballsack and http://anidb.net/ch1169 [Shimura Tae]`s http://anidb.net/ch96892 [guardian spirit]`s guardian spirit, formed from the thousands of "sticky eggs" that Kondou Isao wrapped in tissues and "killed".
name: Kongou Mantama Bosatsu
